response.original_title: AL SUR DEL INVIERNO ESTÁ LA NIEVE
response.overview: In the southern reaches of the earth, where time stands still and nature is as cruel as it is terrifying, ghosts roam the pampas, whispering to the forests and mountains. There, in a shattered landscape, bagüaleros (farmers), ranchers, and peasant families, along with their packs of dogs and livestock, survive the cold, loneliness, and snow.
response.title: AL SUR DEL INVIERNO ESTÁ LA NIEVE

results.name: Trailer - SOUTH OF WINTER, LIES THE SNOW/ AL SUR DEL INVIERNO ESTÁ LA NIEVE
